articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Asian Games 2022 postponed amid COVID surge in China: OCA - Times of India
articles.description: More sports News: The Hangzhou Asian Games, which were scheduled to take place from September 10 to 25, were on Friday postponed indefinitely amid a recent surge in COV
articles.content: Asian Games 2022 postponed amid COVID surge in China: OCA

articles.title: 2022 Asian Games postponed, Chinese state media reports - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Hangzhou was expected to host the Games in September, but CCTV reports that the date will change as China battles its latest Covid-19 outbreak.

articles.author: Laura He, CNN Business
articles.title: Asian markets tumble as China remains fully committed to zero-Covid policy - CNN
articles.description: Asian stock markets and currencies fell Friday, as investors remain worried about the US Federal Reserve's policy changes and China's renewed pledge to stick to its controversial zero-Covid policy.

articles.title: Tearful Amber Heard testifies ex-husband Johnny Depp turned violent - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The actress told a Virginia jury that Depp physically abused her multiple times, starting when he slapped her after she laughed at the writing on one of his tattoos.
